turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Can you order me a coffee from Peets please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sure, where would you like them to pick you up from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: 16501 SE Mill Plain Blvd, Vancouver, WA please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, no problem. What would you like?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I would like a medium almond mild Caramel Macchiato please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay great!

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Oh can you have them do that half sweet please?

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, so you want a medium, half sweet, almond milk caramel macchiato?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Sounds good. I will get that ordered right away.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: And you will be picking it up at from the Mill Plain location?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Great.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Is there anything else I can get for you?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: No thank you not at this time.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay great. That will be ready for pick up shortly.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thank you very much. Have a nice day.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: You too.
